Title: Relates to the rededication of unused funds in the New York state local government records management improvement fund to such fund
Summary: Relates to the mandatory rededication of unused funds in the New York state local government records management improvement fund to such fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง97-i, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the rededication of unused funds in the New York state local government records management improvement fund
